history.proof: intros H1 H2. induction H2. - constructor. - eapply Forall_cons. + apply H1. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. + apply IHForall. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type P, Q : X -> Prop x : X l : list X H1 : forall x0 : X, In x0 (x :: l) -> P x0 -> Q x0 H : P x H2 : Forall P l IHForall : (forall x : X, In x l -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall Q l Unable to unify "P x" with "In x (x :: l)".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros H1 H2. induction H2. - constructor. - eapply Forall_cons. + apply H1. apply H. + apply IHForall.
